posts.title: AhoCorasick Algorithm
posts.text: ç®€ä»‹AhoCorasick ç®—æ³•ï¼ˆç®€ç§° AC è‡ªåŠ¨æœºï¼‰ï¼Œè§£å†³å¤šæ¨¡å¼ä¸²çš„å­—ç¬¦åŒ¹é…é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå³ç»™å®šè‹¥å¹²ä¸ªå•è¯ä¸² $W_i$ï¼Œæ±‚åœ¨æ–‡æœ¬ä¸² $T$ ä¸­çš„å‡ºç°ä½ç½®ã€‚KMP ç®—æ³•è§£å†³å•æ¨¡å¼ä¸²çš„å­—ç¬¦åŒ¹é…ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ AC è‡ªåŠ¨æœºå¯è®¤ä¸ºæ˜¯ KMP ç®—æ³•çš„æ‰©å±•ã€‚ é¢„å¤‡çŸ¥è¯† å­—å…¸æ ‘ï¼ˆTrieï¼‰ï¼šæ ‘ä¸Šä»»æ„èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ°æ ¹çš„è·¯å¾„æ‰€æ„æˆçš„å­ä¸²ï¼Œè®°ä¸º $S(u)$ï¼Œéƒ½æ˜¯æŸä¸ªæ’å…¥ä¸²çš„å‰ç¼€ã€‚ KMP ç®—æ³•ï¼šåˆ©ç”¨æœ€é•¿å‰åç¼€å®Œæˆçº¿æ€§åŒ¹é…ã€‚ æ ¸å¿ƒæ€æƒ³AhoCorasick æœ¬è´¨ä¸Šä¸ KMP ç®—æ³•æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ï¼Œéƒ½æ˜¯é€šè¿‡ç›¸åŒå‰åç¼€å‡å°‘é‡å¤è®¡ç®—é—®é¢˜ï¼Œåªæ˜¯æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ä¸åŒã€‚ å¯¹åº”äº KMPï¼ŒAC è‡ªåŠ¨æœºéœ€è¦æ„å»ºæœ€é•¿å…¬å…±å‰åç¼€ï¼ˆLCPSï¼ŒLongese Common proper Prefix and Suffixï¼‰ï¼Œå³å¯¹äºæ ‘ä¸Šä»»æ„èŠ‚ç‚¹ $u$ï¼Œæ‰¾å‡ºæœ€å¤§æ ‘æ·±çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ $v$ï¼Œæ»¡è¶³ $S(v)$ æ˜¯ $S(u)$ çš„çœŸåç¼€ã€‚å› ä¸ºå­—å…¸æ ‘ä¸Šçš„ä»»æ„èŠ‚ç‚¹ $x$ æ‰€è¡¨ç¤ºçš„ $S(x)$ éƒ½æ˜¯å‰ç¼€ï¼Œæ•…èµ·åæœ€é•¿å…¬å…±å‰åç¼€ã€‚ é€šå¸¸å°†èŠ‚ç‚¹ $v$ è®°ä¸º $fail(u)$ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºä¸² $S(u)$ å¤±é…æ—¶çš„è·³è½¬èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå‡ºäºå¯è¯»æ€§çš„è€ƒè™‘ï¼Œæœ¬æ–‡è®°ä¸º $lcps(u)$ã€‚ $lcps(u)$ çš„æ„å»ºè¿‡ç¨‹ï¼šè®°èŠ‚ç‚¹ $u$ çš„çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸º $f(u)$ï¼Œä¸å…¶è¿è¾¹çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸º $c$ã€‚è‹¥ $lcps(f(u))$ å­˜åœ¨ $c$ çš„å‡ºè¾¹ï¼Œåˆ™ $lcps(u)=trans(lcps(f(u)), c)$ã€‚å¦åˆ™ç»§ç»­æ‰¾ $lcps(lcps(f(u)))$ï¼Œç›´è‡³æ‰¾åˆ°æˆ–åˆ°è¾¾æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼ˆè¯´æ˜æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ï¼‰ã€‚ å›¾ 1. lcps(u) çš„æ„å»º æ£€ç´¢è¿‡ç¨‹å‡è®¾å·²çŸ¥ $lcps(u)$ï¼Œä¸”å­—å…¸æ ‘èŠ‚ç‚¹ $u$ ä¸æ–‡æœ¬ä¸² $T[0:i]$ åŒ¹é…ï¼Œå³ $T[i-|S(u)|+1:i] = S(u)$ã€‚ç»§ç»­åŒ¹é…æœ‰ä¸¤ç§æƒ…å½¢ï¼š $trans(u, T[i+1]) \neq NULL$ï¼Œåˆ™åŒ¹é…é•¿åº¦ +1ã€‚ $trans(u, T[i+1])=NULL$ï¼Œä¸ KMP ç±»ä¼¼ï¼Œåœ¨å­—å…¸æ ‘ä¸­æ‰¾å‡ºæœ€å¤§æ·±åº¦ï¼ˆå³æœ€é•¿å‰ç¼€ï¼‰çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ $v$ï¼Œæ»¡è¶³ $S(v)$ æ˜¯ $S(u)$ çš„çœŸåç¼€ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶ $trans(v, T[i+1])\neq NULL$ã€‚ ä»¤ $v = lcps(u)$ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦èƒ½åŒ¹é…ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ç»§ç»­åˆ¤æ–­ $lcps(lcps(u))$ã€‚ å‚è€ƒä»£ç 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243const int N = 5e5 + 7; // sum(|Wi|)const int E = 26; // character set sizestruct AhoCorasick { int root = 0; int n, lcps[N], trans[N][E]; int end[N]; // end[u] > 0 : S(u) = Wi int new_node() { memset(trans[n], 0, E * sizeof(int)); lcps[n] = root, end[n] = 0; return n++; } void init() { n = 0; root = new_node(); } void insert(const char *str, int len) { int u = root; for (int i = 0; i < len; ++i) { int c = str[i] - 'a'; if (!trans[u][c]) trans[u][c] = new_node(); u = trans[u][c]; } ++end[u]; } void LCPS() { queue<int> Q({root}); while (!Q.empty()) { int u = Q.front(); Q.pop(); for (int c = 0; c < E; ++c) { if (trans[u][c]) { int v = lcps[u]; while (v != root && !trans[v][c]) v = lcps[v]; lcps[trans[u][c]] = u == root ? root : trans[v][c]; Q.push(trans[u][c]); } else trans[u][c] = trans[lcps[u]][c]; } } }};

posts.text: KMP ç®—æ³•è§£å†³åœ¨æ–‡æœ¬ä¸²ï¼ˆtextï¼‰å¿«é€Ÿæ‰¾å‡ºå•è¯ï¼ˆwordï¼‰çš„æ‰€æœ‰å‡ºç°ä½ç½®ã€‚ æš´åŠ›åŒ¹é…çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º $O(|T||W|)$ï¼Œè€Œ KMP ç®—æ³•é€šè¿‡å¼•å…¥æœ€é•¿å‰åç¼€ï¼Œå°†æ£€ç´¢çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦é™è‡³çº¿æ€§ã€‚ æœ€é•¿å‰åç¼€ lps indicates longest proper prefix which is also suffix. æœ€é•¿å‰åç¼€ï¼ˆLPS, Longest proper Prefix and Suffixï¼‰è¡¨ç¤ºæ—¢æ˜¯åŸä¸² $S$ çš„çœŸå‰ç¼€ä¹Ÿæ˜¯åç¼€çš„æœ€é•¿å­ä¸² $T$ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ $|T|\lt |S|$ã€‚ LPS(aaa) = aa \\ LPS(abcdab)=abæ£€ç´¢è¿‡ç¨‹å‡è®¾å·²çŸ¥å•è¯ä¸²çš„æ¯ä¸ªå‰ç¼€ $W[0: i]$ çš„æœ€é•¿å‰åç¼€é•¿åº¦ $lps(i)$ï¼Œä¸”å·²ç»åŒ¹é… $T[i - j: i] = W[0:j]$ã€‚ç»§ç»­åŒ¹é…æœ‰ä¸¤ç§æƒ…å½¢ï¼š $T[i+1]=W[j + 1]$ï¼Œåˆ™åŒ¹é…é•¿åº¦ +1ã€‚ $T[i+ 1] \neq W[j+1]$ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶æ˜¾ç„¶è¦é‡æ–°æ‰¾å•è¯ä¸²çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæœ€é•¿å‰ç¼€ $W[0:k], k\lt j$ï¼Œä½¿å¾— $T[i-k:i]=W[0:k]$ ä¸” $T[i + 1]=W[k+ 1]$ï¼Œç»§ç»­ä¸ $i+1$ ç»“å°¾çš„æ–‡æœ¬ä¸²åŒ¹é…ã€‚ å›¾ 1. æƒ…å½¢ 2 ç¤ºæ„å›¾ã€‚è™šçº¿æ¡†è¡¨ç¤ºç›¸åŒéƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚æ­¤æ—¶ $W[0:k]$ ä¸ $W[0:j]$ çš„åç¼€ç›¸åŒï¼ŒåŒæ—¶å…¶æœ¬èº«æ˜¯å‰ç¼€ã€‚ ä»¤ $k=lps(j)$ï¼Œè‹¥ $T[i+1]=W[k+1]$ï¼Œåˆ™ç»§ç»­åŒ¹é…ã€‚å¦åˆ™å°† $k$ è§†ä¸ºæ–°çš„ $j$ï¼Œåˆ™è½¬åŒ–æˆæƒ…å½¢ 2 ç›¸åŒçš„å­é—®é¢˜ã€‚ æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šåŒ¹é…æˆåŠŸçš„å¤æ‚åº¦æ˜¯çº¿æ€§çš„ã€‚è€ŒåŒ¹é…å¤±è´¥æ—¶ä¼šå‡å°å•è¯ä¸²çš„å‰ç¼€é•¿åº¦ï¼Œå‡ä¸€é•¿åº¦è‡³å°‘å¯¹åº”ä¸€æ¬¡çš„æˆåŠŸåŒ¹é…ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¹Ÿæ˜¯çº¿æ€§çš„ã€‚æ•…ç®—æ³•æ€»çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦æ˜¯çº¿æ€§çš„ã€‚ é¢„å¤„ç†å¯¹äºå•è¯ä¸²çš„æœ€é•¿å‰åç¼€ $lps(i)$ï¼Œæœ¬è´¨ä¸Šæ˜¯å•è¯ä¸²çš„è‡ªæˆ‘åŒ¹é…ï¼Œå³æ­¤æ—¶æ–‡æœ¬ä¸²ä¸ºå•è¯ä¸²ã€‚å¯¹åº”äºæ£€ç´¢è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­çš„ä¸¤ç§æƒ…å½¢ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¾ˆå®¹æ˜“åœ°å®Œæˆ $lps(i)$ çš„æ„é€ ã€‚ å‚è€ƒä»£ç 1234567891011121314151617// n = |T|, m = |W|, index = [0, n)lps[0] = -1;for (int i = 1, j = -1; i < m; ++i) { while (j >= 0 && W[i] != W[j + 1]) j = lps[j]; j += W[i] == W[j + 1]; lps[i] = j;}for (int i = 0, j = -1; i < n; ++i) { while (j >= 0 && T[i] != W[j + 1]) j = lps[j]; j += T[i] == W[j + 1]; if (j == m - 1) { // match successfully j = lps[j]; }}

V_j) = i\times S_i- V_iåŒâ€ç©å…·è£…ç®±TOYâ€ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶ç›¸å½“äºä»¤æˆªè· $Ans - V_j$ æœ€å¤§ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ­¤æ—¶éœ€è¦ç»´æŠ¤ç‚¹é›† $(i, iS_i-V_i)$ çš„ä¸Šå‡¸å£³ã€‚ å› ä¸º $A_i$ å­˜åœ¨è´Ÿæ•°ï¼Œæ•…æ–œç‡ $S_i$ å¹¶ä¸å…·æœ‰å•è°ƒæ€§ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦äºŒåˆ†ç¡®å®šæœ€ä¼˜ç‚¹çš„ä½ç½®ã€‚ å‚è€ƒ æ–œç‡ä¼˜åŒ–DP æ–œç‡ä¼˜åŒ–dpå°ç»“ ä»£ç [HNOI2008]ç©å…·è£…ç®±TOY12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;typedef double db;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> vi;typedef pair<int, int> pii;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_back#define sz(x) ((int)(x).size())#define all(x) begin(x),end(x)#define rep(i,l,r) for(int i=(l);i<(r);++i)#define per(i,l,r) for(int i=(r)-1;i>=(l);--i)#define dd(x) cout << #x << "=" << x << ", "#define de(x) cout << #x << "=" << x << endl//-------const int N = 5e5 + 7;int n, L, C[N];ll S[N], dp[N];struct P { ll x, y; P() {} P(ll _x, ll _y) { x = _x, y = _y; } P operator-(const P &p) const { return P(x - p.x, y - p.y); } ll operator^(const P &p) const { return x * p.y - y * p.x; }};#define X(i) (i + S[i] + L + 1)#define Y(i) (dp[i] + X(i) * X(i))int main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &L); rep(i, 1, n + 1) scanf("%d", C + i); rep(i, 1, n + 1) S[i] = S[i - 1] + C[i]; deque<P> Q; Q.push_back(P(X(0), Y(0))); rep(i, 1, n + 1) { ll g = 2 * (i + S[i]); while (sz(Q) > 1 && (Q[1].y - Q[0].y) < (Q[1].x - Q[0].x) * g) Q.pop_front(); dp[i] = Q[0].y - g * Q[0].x + (i + S[i]) * (i + S[i]); P a(X(i), Y(i)); while (sz(Q) > 1 && ((Q[sz(Q) - V[i])struct P { ll x, y; P() {} P(ll _x, ll _y) { x = _x, y = _y; } P operator-(const P &p) const { return P(x - p.x, y - p.y); } ll operator^(const P &p) const { return x * p.y - y * p.x; }};bool chk(deque<P> &Q, int i, ll G) { return (Q[i + 1].y - Q[i].y) >= (Q[i + 1].x - Q[i].x) * G; }int main() { scanf("%d", &n); rep(i, 1, n + 1) scanf("%d", a + i); rep(i, 1, n + 1) S[i] = S[i - 1] + a[i]; rep(i, 1, n + 1) V[i] = V[i - 1] + i * a[i]; deque<P> Q; Q.push_back(P(X(0), Y(0))); ll ans = LLONG_MIN; rep(i, 1, n + 1) { // answer int l = 0, r = max(0, sz(Q) - 2); while (l + 1 < r) { int z = (l + r) >> 1; chk(Q, z, S[i]) ? l = z : r = z; } int j = l; if (chk(Q, r, S[i])) j = r + 1; else if (chk(Q, l, S[i])) j = l + 1; else j = l; ll f = Q[j].y - S[i] * Q[j].x + V[i]; ans = max(ans, f); // maintain P a(X(i), Y(i)); while (sz(Q) > 1 && ((Q[sz(Q) - 2] - a) ^ (Q.back() - a)) >= 0) Q.pop_back(); Q.push_back(a); } printf("%lld", ans); return 0;}

è´ªå¿ƒé€‰æ‹©å‡å€¼è¾ƒå¤§çš„æ®µã€‚ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;typedef double db;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> vi;typedef pair<int, int> pii;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_back#define sz(x) ((int)(x).size())#define all(x) begin(x),end(x)#define rep(i,l,r) for(int i=(l);i<(r);++i)#define per(i,l,r) for(int i=(r)-1;i>=(l);--i)#define dd(x) cout << #x << "=" << x << ", "#define de(x) cout << #x << "=" << x << endl//-------const int N = 1e5 + 7;int n, m, A[N], B[N];struct Node { int num; ll sum; Node() {} Node(int _num, ll _sum) { num = _num, sum = _sum; } Node operator+(const Node &p) const { return Node(num + p.num, sum + p.sum); } bool operator<(const Node &p) const { return sum * p.num < p.sum * num; }} a[N], b[N];int gao(int n, int *r, Node *a) { int top = 0; rep(i, 0, n) { scanf("%d", r + 0; for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < la || j < lb; ) { while (i < la && (j == lb || !(a[i] < b[j]))) { rep(k, n, n + a[i].num) ans += 1ll * (k + m + 1) * A[k]; n += a[i++].num; } while (j < lb && (i == la ||
